description: A billing group is a set of linked account which belong to the same end customer. It can be seen as a virtual consolidated billing family.

PricingPlanArn.description: ARN of the attached pricing plan

Arn.markdownDescription:
Billing Group ARN

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: arn:aws(-cn)?:billingconductor::[0-9]{12}:billinggroup/?[0-9]{12}  

Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_\+=\.\-@]+  

Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 1024   

Update requires: No interruption

PrimaryAccountId.description: This account will act as a virtual payer account of the billing group
